description: Retrieves the margin summary report, which includes the Amazon Web Services cost and charged amount (pro forma cost) by Amazon Web Service for a specific billing group.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) that uniquely identifies the billing group.

parameters.name: BillingPeriodRange
parameters.description: A time range for which the margin summary is effective. You can specify up to 12 months. The inclusive start billing period that defines a billing period range for the margin summary. The exclusive end billing period that defines a billing period range for the margin summary. For example, if you choose a billing period that starts in October 2023 and ends in December 2023, the margin summary will only include data from October 2023 and November 2023.

nested_params.name: InclusiveStartBillingPeriod
nested_params.description: The inclusive start billing period that defines a billing period range for the margin summary.

nested_params.name: ExclusiveEndBillingPeriod
nested_params.description: The exclusive end billing period that defines a billing period range for the margin summary. For example, if you choose a billing period that starts in October 2023 and ends in December 2023, the margin summary will only include data from October 2023 and November 2023.

parameters.name: GroupBy
parameters.description: A list of strings that specify the attributes that are used to break down costs in the margin summary reports for the billing group. For example, you can view your costs by the Amazon Web Service name or the billing period. (string) ---

nested_items.name: BillingGroupCostReportResults
nested_items.description: The list of margin summary reports.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) that uniquely identifies the billing group.

nested_items.name: AWSCost
nested_items.description: The actual Amazon Web Services charges for the billing group.

nested_items.name: ProformaCost
nested_items.description: The hypothetical Amazon Web Services charges based on the associated pricing plan of a billing group.

nested_items.name: MarginPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage of the billing group margin.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: The list of key-value pairs that represent the attributes by which the BillingGroupCostReportResults are grouped. For example, if you want the Amazon S3 service-level breakdown of a billing group for November 2023, the attributes list will contain a key-value pair of "PRODUCT_NAME" and "S3" and a key-value pair of "BILLING_PERIOD" and "Nov 2023".

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key in a key-value pair that describes the margin summary.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value in a key-value pair that describes the margin summary.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token used on subsequent calls to get reports.
